title: Wemo HomeKit Smart Plug with Thread featuring boosted performance and reliability now available
content:
Back at CES in January, Belkin announced its Wemo Smart Plug, Light Switch, and Dimmer would be seeing an upgrade with Matter over Thread support. Now the more capable Smart Plug is available for purchase.

more…

The post Wemo HomeKit Smart Plug with Thread featuring boosted performance and reliability now available appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The new Wemo Smart Plug with Thread including Apple HomeKit support is now available for purchase with improved speed and reliability.
